
{{alias}}( id )
    Returns an error message corresponding to a provided two-character error
    identifier.

    Parameters
    ----------
    id: string
        Error identifier.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string|null
        Error message.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( '8t' )
    'invalid option. `%s` option must be an array. Option: `%s`.'

    See Also
    --------
